document.full_text: a u.s.-led research team may have finally located the lost city of atlantis, the legendary metropolis believed swamped by a tsunami thousands of years ago in mud flats in southern spain.
document.title: lost city of atlantis, swamped by tsunami, may be found
lines_and_colors: a u.s.-led research team may have finally located the lost city of atlantis, the legendary metropolis believed swamped by a tsunami thousands of years ago in mud flats in southern spain.
